sortable.title: Rank
sortable.description: Companies are ranked by total revenues for their respective fiscal years.

sortable.title: Revenues ($M)
sortable.description: Companies are ranked by total revenues for their respective fiscal years.

sortable.title: Revenue Percent Change
sortable.description: Increase/decrease in revenues between the current and prior fiscal years.

sortable.title: Profits ($M)
sortable.description: Net income after extraordinary charges for a company's respective fiscal year.

sortable.title: Profits Percent Change
sortable.description: Increase/decrease in profits between the current and prior fiscal years.

sortable.title: Assets ($M)
sortable.description: Total assets on a company's fiscal year-end balance sheet.

sortable.title: Employees
sortable.description: Total employees (full-time equivalent, if available) at fiscal year-end.

sortable.title: Market Value (as of March 31, 2015)
sortable.description: Common shares outstanding multiplied by the closing price on March 31, 2015.
